titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to establish an Assistant Secretary for Rural Economic Investment and an Office of Rural Economic Investment, to ensure that rural communities are adequately represented in Federal decisionmaking for transportation policy, and for other purposes.
Rural Economic Infrastructure Equity Act of 2019
Rural Economic Infrastructure Equity Act of 2019
Rural Economic Infrastructure Equity Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
